name: Export Variable Products
author: Fahad Mahmood

sections.description:
WooCommerce is an awesome eCommerce plugin that allows you to sell anything. This plugin will help you to Export Variable Products in CSV format.

  • Author: Fahad Mahmood

  • Project URI: http://androidbubble.com/blog/wordpress/plugins/export-variable-products

Tags

woocommerce, orders, users, customers, data

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. There will now be a Split icon in the to Woocommerce order overview page within the order actions.
sections.faq:
How to use this plugin?

Open any WooCommerce variable product, you will see the export button on product edit page.

In which format data will be exported?

This plugin export data in an excel sheet.

How to import product?

There is an Import button with Export button on edit page of WooCommerce variable product. Click Import button and browse file to import.

sections.screenshots:
1. Products list page > open any variable product in edit mode.

  2. By using export option, you can export variatons meta data in xlsx file for easy edits.

  3. By using import option, you can update/replace variatons meta data from xlsx file to WooCommerce with convenience.
sections.reviews:
Excelente plugin para produtos variáveis.

By Sites (ccsites) on December 19, 2021

Esse plugin conseguiu exportar com precisão os produtos variáveis do woocommerce, parabéns ao desenvolvedor. This plugin managed to accurately export the variable products of woocommerce, congratulations to the developer.

useless

By FarhangQ (imfq) on May 9, 2021

useless plugin
